---
title: "Data Summary Report"
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
output: html_document
params:
  df_input: NULL
  df_input_name: NULL
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(skimr)
library(tidyverse)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE,
  error = FALSE,
  include = TRUE
)
df_input = params$df_input
df_input_name = params$df_input_name
```

```{r}
df_input %>%
  skim(.data_name = df_input_name)
```
